ref.title: The role of association of ions in ionic liquid/molecular solvent mixtures on metal extraction
ref.full: Andanson, J.-M.; Papaiconomou, N.; Cable, P.-A.; Trakia, M.; Billard, I.; Husson, P. (2017) Phys. Chem. Chem. Phys. 19(42), 28834-28840.
